::Slaughter::

    Slaughter could see that he still hadn't lost his touch, but was careful
not to show it.

    "Squawktalk........rrffghgh........was..." slime kept dripping from
Slaughter's body and mouth, and sprayed a little as he talked with his
gurgly, mutant-ish voice, "a
traitor............Decepticons.............Against
Maximals!.........Perhaps.....rrffhhg....I......rrffgh.......could
get......revenge........on two certainghhffh, Maximaflglgffds.
Torca.....and.....Klant!!!!!!   RAAAHHH!!!!" Slaughter yelled, hating Torca
and Klant for killing him as Skulletron.


----- Original Message -----
From: "robertdahl" <rdahl@...>

Sent: Monday, June 11, 2001 8:40 PM
Subject: Re: Same old Skulletron at heart......


> Motormaster began to squint, and try to shake something out of his head.
> He kept his firm vice like clench of Slaughters fleshy neck. "What, no
> Squawtalk's dead...not smart enough too....I failed
> him......grrrrrrrrrrrrrrr." Motormaster released Slaughter, to clutch
> his head in wondering what was going on. "Megatron....ordered you dead."
> he seemed to confused to continue.
>
> OOC: Do you want to see Motormaster's thoughts?
